footer.heading: Delete Your Data is a service from Neon Law
footer.text: All content presented herein is for informational purposes only. Nothing should be construed as legal advice. Transmission and receipt of this information is not intended to create and does not constitute, an attorney-client relationship with lawyers on this platform. There is no expectation of attorney-client privilege or confidentiality of anything you may communicate to us in this forum. Do not act upon any information presented without seeking professional counsel.

languageDropdown.text: Currently viewing this site in English

beginUpwardMQ.heading: Upward Mobility Questionnaire
beginUpwardMQ.text: Thanks for expressing your interest in Neon Law and our commitment to Upward Mobility. Please note that taking this questionnaire does not constitute an attorney-client relationship. An attorney-client relationship only exists if you have a signed retainer with our firm. Please contact us if you are interested in attaining our services.

finishUpwardMQ.heading: Thank You for Taking the Upward Mobility Questionnaire
finishUpwardMQ.text: You have completed the questionnaire. Your answers are:

upwardMQ.missing_question: A question is missing from the questionnaire. Please contact support.

pages_admin.heading: Admin Portal
pages_admin.text: Choose an Option on your Left.

pages_portal.heading: Your Legal Matters
pages_portal.text: You currently do not have any active matters with our firm or our network. Contact us if you are interested in retaining our services.

pages_pb.heading: Contact Rickie Slaughter
pages_pb.text1: You can send a letter to Rickie at Rickie Slaughter NV #85902 1250 E Arica Road Eloy, AZ 85131
pages_pb.text2: Or, if you fill out your info below, we will mail out a letter on your behalf.

pages_upward_mobility.heading: Upward Mobility
pages_upward_mobility.text: Upward mobility refers to the come up, or improving your socio-economic situation to a point where you can provide for others. No matter where you are today, we can help you take care of those you love.
